title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Hands-on Workshop on Technology Integration for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and ability to use fundamental smartphone functions
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically record experimental data using smartphone-based science data collection tools (e.g., sensor apps).
Students can visually represent and share scientific inquiry results using online collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Jamboard).
Complex scientific concepts can be explained through experiential learning using AR/VR science simulation apps.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
